summary: A small collection of followers based off my characters
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b][u]Tae-Rai and Friends Follower Mod[/u][/b][/color][/heading]

This mod is a simple collection of all my Skyrim PC characters. I love every one of them and have been using them as followers for some time now and I figured I would share them with the world! You should be able to marry all of them, but please let me know if there are problems!

[heading][color=red][b]DAWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN DLC REQUIRED[/b][/color][/heading]

[color=darkorange]====[b]Whose Here?[/b]====[/color]

Tae-Rai - Male Argonian Barbarian Archer, found in the Bee and Barb in Riften. Brother of Rai-Kae.
Rai-Kae - Male Argonian vampire Necromancer, found in the Ragged Flagon in Riften. Brother of Tae-Rai.
Olivus - Imperial Archer. Skyrim's Green Arrow
Ra'Sankari - Male Khajiit Thief, found in the Worker's House at Mixwater Mill. Former skooma addict.
Boto - Male Nord Warrior, found in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm. Strong Stormcloak supporter.
Ralos - Male Dunmer Barbarian, found in the Retchling Netch in Raven Rock. Hates the gods.
Jeta - Female Khajiit Beserker , found in Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead. Innocent yet sneaky.
Do''Rahza - Male Khajiit Paladin, found in Nightgate Inn, in the Pale. Proud, honorable warrior.

[i]More followers coming soon![/i]

All followers will do the basic follower stuff, and, despite their backgrounds, won't mind if you commit crimes! All their armor also ties into their personalities and stories, so please don't bug me about how crappy some of their armor is *coughBatocough*. Some warpaint is missing too, but it's not a big deal right now.

[color=darkorange]====[b]Installation[/b]====[/color]

Drag and drop to Data folder after unzipping OR use the NMM for easy installation.

[color=darkorange]====[b]Compartability[/b]====[/color]

I also took the liberty of editing the Worker's House for Ra'Sankari to make it a bit more livable so any mod that changes this will make my mod INCOMPATIBLE.

[color=darkorange]====[b]Future Plans[/b]====[/color]

More followers! Plus quests and unique dialogue. As well as some letters and journals detailing their lives and back stories. I am currently seeking voice actors for each of my characters. If you're interested, please message me.

[color=darkorange]==== [b]Permissions and Credits[/b]====[/color]

This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
All characters belong to me, except for Ra'Sankari, which is my partner's and gave him to me to torture- I mean, play with :)
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
